      • chooseAttr

        public int chooseAttr()
        Method override to find highest Attribute value and choose that Attribute. Method iterates through the values of each Attribute for the Card upon which the method is called and returns the choice of the Attribute with the highest value.
        Overrides:
        chooseAttr in class Player
        Returns:
        The reference number of the highest valued Attribute.
